EmailTemplate.name: EB-202204-EMP-ENT-EM-2022-Conference-Board-Invite.Invite_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Get your free pass to Conference Board’s Annual Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Have you registered for Conference Board yet? If not, we invite you to register <[[https://www.conference-board.org/conferences/locations.cfm?conferenceid=23551]]> using the Teladoc Health coupon code, TeladocComp, for complimentary admission in New York on April 28-29 and/or San Diego on May 10-11. You can meet our team at the Teladoc Health booth, and we also invite you to join our session on Day 1 from 9:30 – 10:15 AM:
Virtual care is top of mind for employers, are you unlocking the full potential?
- Understand our Virtual Care Transformation Model and results from leading employers, including best practices and lessons learned - Deliver a positive, healthcare experience that fits the needs of various populations - Learn about real-world strategies to streamline healthcare access and costs across today’s distributed workforce
We look forward to having you join us!
